p: Carvacrol is another component that has antimicrobial activity. It was supposed that fatty acid profiles and the structure of the cell membrane are changed by carvacrol. Moreover, it was reported that carvacrol could influence proton motive force and the synthesis of flagellin and thus reduce bacterial motility ( 3, 93). Furthermore, it was indicated that membrane-bound ATPase activity of L. monocytogenes would be inhibited by components such as carvacrol, eugenol, and cinnamaldehyde ( 96).
